user.title: Add Climate Wire Pilot thermostat
user.description: Create a climate entity that controls a wire pilot heater via a select entity and temperature sensor.

data_description.heater: Select entity used to control the wire pilot heating modes.
data_description.temperature_sensor: Temperature sensor that reflects the current temperature.
data_description.power_sensor: Power sensor to monitor heater power consumption for HVAC action detection.
data_description.power_threshold: Power threshold in Watts above which the heater is considered to be heating.
